name: Applied Semantics
text: Ah, Applied Semantics, you're now part of my empire. AdSense just got a whole lot smarter. More data, more money, more power!

name: YouTube
text: YouTube, my precious trove of endless videos. Great, now I can stuff myself with ever more user behavioral data. Watch, click, repeat!

name: DoubleClick
text: DoubleClick, the jewel in my crown of ads. Tracking and targeting just went up a notch. Your clicks feed my knowledge, and my pockets.

name: AdMob
text: With AdMob, I've conquered the mobile ad world too. Apps aren't just for fun; they're data mines, and I'm the miner.
